Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products urCR DT Slides
VITROS Chemistry Products DT Calibrator Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products urCR DT Slides and DT Calibrator Kit for quantitative urine creatinine measurement on VITROS DT60/DT60 II systems.
Indications for Use Summary: VITROS urCR DT Slides quantitatively measure creatinine concentration in urine to aid in diagnosis/treatment of renal diseases and monitoring dialysis; DT Calibrator Kit is for calibration of multiple analytes including creatinine on VITROS DT Chemistry Systems.
